author: Peerzada Ashiq
text:
A Hizbul Mujahideen militant responsible for killing a father and son last September was arrested in Kashmir on Tuesday.

According to a Srinagar-based police spokesperson, the Sopore police apprehended Towheed Bashir for killing a surrendered militant Bashir Ahmed Bhat and his three-year-old son Burhan at Sagipora on September 19, 2015.

The militant has been on the run after his accomplice Tahir Bashir Sheikh alias Tahir Malla was arrested after the incident.
title: Hizb militant held for killing surrendered ultra
